title: Ezekiel Pfeifer
description: A portfolio site showing the work of software engineer Zeke Pfeifer

projects.title: The Tree Company
projects.description: A custom-built e-commerce website for construction sign seller The Tree Company using Ruby on Rails, TypeScript, React, and GraphQL

projects.title: Brain Food
projects.description: A scroller created with vanilla JavaScript and the D3.js data visualization library that shows information about some highly nutritious foods

projects.title: TreeBnB
projects.description: Clone of rental bookings site Airbnb with a treehouse theme. The site uses Ruby on Rails and PostgreSQL for its back-end together with React-Redux on the front-end, and utilizes the Google Maps API and the React Dates calendar picker library
